solution_line_template: The number of customers who were served coffee in the restaurant is {coffee_fraction}*{total_people_served} = <<{coffee_fraction}*{total_people_served}={people_who_bought_coffee}>>{people_who_bought_coffee}

If the total number of customers who came to the restaurant was {total_people_served}, then {total_people_served}-{people_who_bought_coffee} = <<{total_people_served}-{people_who_bought_coffee}={people_who_did_not_buy_coffee}>>{people_who_did_not_buy_coffee} customers did not buy coffee
